hero.description: Full-Stack Developer with a solid background in building scalable and efficient web applications. With a focus on best development practices, I have participated in projects of various sizes, from startups to established companies.

cards.title: Git Version Control
cards.description: Extensive experience in managing code repositories, implementing branching strategies, and ensuring smooth collaboration through Git. Proficient in tools like GitHub and GitLab for version control and CI/CD pipelines.

cards.title: App Design
cards.description: Skilled in creating intuitive and user-friendly interfaces for mobile and web applications. Combining design principles with modern frameworks to enhance user experience.

cards.title: Back-end Development
cards.description: Proficient in developing robust and scalable backend systems using technologies like NestJS, Express, and Python. Expertise in creating RESTful APIs and integrating with databases such as MongoDB and PostgreSQL.

cards.title: Web Development
cards.description: Building responsive and dynamic websites with React, Next.js, and TypeScript. Experience in delivering high-performance applications tailored to client needs.

cards.title: Freelancing
cards.description: Delivering tailored software solutions to clients, leveraging expertise in full-stack development. Skilled in project management and effective communication to meet client expectations.

list.title: Meal Management System
list.description: System for companies allowing users to request specific dishes and manage daily menus. Includes authentication and a well-structured database.

list.title: Movie Catalog Application
list.description: An app that consumes a movie API to explore detailed information, watch trailers, and discover the latest releases in theaters. Perfect for movie enthusiasts staying updated.

list.title: InfoMortys
list.description: Web application that consumes the Rick and Morty API to display detailed information about characters, locations, episodes, and other data from the series. Explore the Rick and Morty universe in an interactive way.

list.title: Landing Brother Madrid
list.description: Basic landing page developed as a challenge requested by the company. Demonstrates skills in responsive design and frontend development.

list.title: Poke React
list.description: Application that queries the Pok√©mon API to obtain different Pok√©mon, allowing filtering by attributes, names, and more.

list.title: Seshat
list.description: Creative platform for sharing stories, poems, and narratives. Promotes diversity and creativity.

list.title: Weather Application
list.description: Simple application using the OpenWeatherMap API to display current weather.
